scenario_text.value:
...So you’re saying Dracumon ate your canned
food, Kaito?

Yeah, that’s right! I was keeping it for a
rainy day!

I told you it wasn’t me!
Why would I steal anything of yours, Kaito?!

But you and I are the only ones that knew
about it!

That’s true, but...
I didn’t eat it! Honest!

Then there’s gotta be someone else!
Any ideas, Takuma?

Nope...
Maybe it was some kind of mistake?

Not a chance, I stored it in a safe place.
It’s gotta be you!

You say that, but I said it ain’t me!
You gotta believe me!

Dracumon keeps denying it. Maybe you should
trust him?

...Yeah, you’re right.
But then who’s the culprit...?
Was it really all that important?

(If it was for Miu, I can understand why he’d
get all worked up...)

Who’s the damn thief? When I find them, I’mma
turn them into my personal punching bag!
